mapper.insert: insert into sys_data_struct_node_attribute (struct_code, node_code, attribute_code, attribute_value) values (#{structCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{nodeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attributeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attributeValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select struct_code, node_code, attribute_code, attribute_value from sys_data_struct_node_attribute
